text: Table 15-3. (continued) Instance-Level Member MeaninginLlife ThreadState Gets the state of this thread, which may be assigned a value from the ThreadState enumeration. Abort() Instructs the .NET Core Runtime to terminate the thread as soon as possible. Interrupt() Interrupts (e.g., wakes) the current thread from a suitable wait period. Join() Blocks the calling thread until the specified thread (the one on which Join() is called) exits. Resume() Resumes a thread that has been previously suspended. Start() Instructs the .NET Core Runtime to execute the thread ASAP. Suspend() Suspends the thread. If the thread is already suspended, a call to Suspend() has no effect.
